titles.title: Military Retiree Veterans Health Care Eligibility Act

To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that retired members of the Armed Forces shall be eligible for priority health care from the Department of Veterans Affairs on the same basis as former prisoners of war.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 8/1/2001--Introduced. Military Retiree Veterans Health Care Eligibility Act - Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to furnish hospital care and medical services, and authorizes the Secretary to provide nursing home care, to military retirees on the same basis as such services are provided to former prisoners of war.
